ArgonTest.Name: Non-abstract class with abstract method
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
open class A <: Object
public new() end
public abstract proc self.say_hello(): () end
class B <: A
public new() initialize _ = A.new() end
public override proc self.say_hello(): () do puts 'Hello World' end
end
proc main(): () do let a: A = B.new() a.say_hello() end
